content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining Operation at (-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -15, -50)
- Wooden chest for collecting iron ore (position -14.5, -48.5)

### Smelting Area at (0, 0)
Multiple furnaces for smelting operations:
- Stone furnace at (0, 0) - processing iron plates
- Stone furnace at (2, 0)
- Stone furnace at (4, 4)
- Stone furnace at (6, 4)
- Stone furnace at (-14, -47) - processing copper plates

### Automation Science Pack Production at (24.5, 4.5)
Complex assembly setup consisting of:
- Assembling machine 1 (position 24.5, 4.5)
- Input wooden chest (position 21.5, 4.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 27.5, 4.5)
- Two burner inserters:
  - One at (22.5, 4.5) feeding from input chest
  - One at (26.5, 4.5) moving products to output chest
- Connected to electricity network through multiple small electric poles

### Power Generation System
Steam-based power setup:
- Steam engine (position 9.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -2.0, 23.5)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Connected through extensive pipe network:
  - Water system connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam system connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electric pole network distributing power to assembling machines

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Keep sufficient coal in inventory for refueling operations
- Monitor fuel levels in burner mining drills and boilers to prevent work stoppage

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure continuous supply of copper ore for copper plate production
- Monitor input materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels) for automation science pack assembly

### Item Extraction Errors
- Verify items are present in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the target chest is within reach before attempting extraction operations

### Power System Issues
- Maintain constant fuel supply to boiler to prevent power interruptions
- Monitor steam engine connection status to ensure proper power distribution

### Assembly Machine Operation
- Keep consistent supply of all required ingredients to prevent production stoppages
- Monitor power supply to prevent "NO_POWER" status
